text: læa phwk khea di hı mi khun kæ xallxh sung brrda pha khi hæng yin thang«thi phraxngkh thrng bangkeid phwk khea tæ phwk khea di xup lok sʹ hı kæ phraxngkh sung brrda butr chay læa brrda butr hying doy prascak khwam ru phraxngkh thrng brisuththi læa thrng sungsng kein kwa thi phwk khea ca klaw hı laksʹna kan
